T02TD1419E:316a-43: de yis khyad par 'phags pa'i lam du 'gyur //
T02TD1419E:316a-45: dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i 'grel pa gru gzings las bstod pa'i ngag dang mchod pa bzhi dang dam tshig dang sngom pa bsten pa'i bya ba'i rnam par gzhag pa'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi sbyor ba'i dang po dang mthang de'i dgos pas gnyis su med pa'i bsgrub pa rgyas par bshad pa ste le'u lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02TD1419E:316b-0: // / da ni rgyud kyi @316b mtshan nyid byung ba dang nye bar sdud pa dag gi gnas skabs gsungs pa /
T02TD1419E:316b-1: 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1419E:316b-2: rab tu byung ba ni rab ni mang po'i don ste byung ba'o //
T02TD1419E:316b-4: zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo sngom pa la sogs pa rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud rnams su ste 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho la sogs pa'i ming yang shin tu rnyed par dka' ba'o //
T02TD1419E:316b-5: mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs //
T02TD1419E:316b-6: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud rnams kyi man ngag bsdus pa'i de kho na nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
T02TD1419E:316b-7: mtshan nyid med pa thams cad spangs ;
T02TD1419E:316b-8: / zhes bya ba ni mu stegs can la sogs pa'i ye shes kyi lta pa spangs pa'o //
T02TD1419E:316b-9: sum cu rtsa bdun bdag nyid can //
T02TD1419E:316b-10: zhes bya ba ni rgyud thams cad gang bshad pa 'di brjod par bya ba dang /
T02TD1419E:316b-11: brjod pa po la sogs pa'i 'brel ba'i rnal 'byor de thams cad sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bdag nyid can no //
T02TD1419E:316b-12: gnyis su med pa'i mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho dang /
T02TD1419E:316b-13: gnyis su med ces bya ba ni mkha' 'gro zhes bya ba ni ri rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i dpa' bo rnams te /
T02TD1419E:316b-14: rgya mtsho zhes bya ba ni de'i tshad kyi rnal 'byor ma rnams so //
T02TD1419E:316b-15: de rnams kyis rgyud thams cad gnyis su med par bsdus ba'i don gyis sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bdag nyid kyi sbyor ba bstan pa zhes bya bar dgongs so //
T02TD1419E:316b-16: 'di rnams kyi 'di thams cad kyi yang rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba ni rtsa ba'i mdo sde de nyid rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po ye shes dang shes bya'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1419E:316b-17: 'dus pa'i rnam pa'i gzugs zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gang chig gi rgyan 'dus pa ste bsdus pa'i gzugs su bsdu ba byas nas thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs pa'o //
T02TD1419E:316b-18: de yang sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams kyi zhal la gnas zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs pa'i bstan bcos nye bar spyod pa la sogs par gnas pa ste gang rnams de rnams de de bzhin du bshad do //
T02TD1419E:316b-19: za ma tog ni gnas te de rnams kyi lus so //
T02TD1419E:316b-20: ya ga thams cad cas bya ba ni aa'i yi ge la sogs pa'i dbyangs rnams 'jog pa'o //
T02TD1419E:317a-0: ste'i yi ges kyang dngos po thams cad kyi ming la sogs pa'i 'du shes @317a * //
T02TD1419E:317a-1: rnams bskyed pa'i gnas te sprul pa gnyis kyis so //
T02TD1419E:317a-2: de ltar 'di rnams thams cad kyi chen po ste rgyud chen po mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho la sogs pa 'dir 'dus pa'i gzugs su 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa drug gi rtsa ba'i mdo sde rnam par 'chad pa por 'gyur ro //
T02TD1419E:317a-3: rgya che bar ni du ma'o ;
T02TD1419E:317a-4: / mdor bsdus pas stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ni chos kyi phung po'i tshad de ni nges pa'o //
T02TD1419E:317a-5: 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa drug gi rgyud rgya chen po de'i dbus nas yang yongs su bsdus pa'i gzugs snying po lta bu chung du mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho de ltar 'di'i ming du bshad pa'o //
T02TD1419E:317a-6: ri rab kyi rdul zhes bya ba la sogs pas rgyun 'chad pa med par rab tu 'bab pa ste de de bzhin du bshad do //
T02TD1419E:317a-7: slar yang rtsod pa'i dus su rgyud chen po mngon par brjod pa 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa drug pa sh'akya seng+ges gsungs so //
T02TD1419E:317a-8: de'i nang nas slar yang rdo rje phag mo la sogs pa ma mo 'dus pa rnams kyis rgyud 'di rdo rje'i gnas su bcom ldan 'das la thos pas phan tshun rjes su bstan pa byas nas bsdus pa mdzad pa ste gang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa de la mngon par dga' ba ste /
T02TD1419E:317a-9: tshig 'di la zhes bya ba ni gzhung gi tshig gi tshang la yang ngo //
T02TD1419E:317a-10: lhag ma gzhan pa'i sems can rnams 'grol zhes bya ba ni rab tu gsungs so //
T02TD1419E:317a-11: rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor rgya mtsho'o //
T02TD1419E:317a-12: ye shes zhes bya ba ni ye shes rgya mtsho'o //
T02TD1419E:317a-13: sngom pa zhes bya ba ni sngom ba rgya mtsho'o //
T02TD1419E:317a-14: bya ba zhes bya ba ni bya ba rgya mtsho'o //
T02TD1419E:317a-15: de kho na nyid ces bya ba ni de kho na nyid rgya mtsho ste //
T02TD1419E:317a-16: 'di rnams zhes bya ba ni rgyud lnga po 'di rnams la mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho zhes bya ba 'di gtso bo ste rgyud kyi rgyal po rgyud lnga dang mnyam par rgya mtsho drug por mdor bsdus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po gzhan gyi ming can no //
T02TD1419E:317a-17: de'i gru gzings ni pha rol du 'gro bar byed pa ste /
T02TD1419E:317a-18: ba yig bzang po'i gdong rnams la //
T02TD1419E:317a-19: dus thams cad du dran pa ste //
T02TD1419E:317a-20: aom yig bsgom pa'i lam du ni //
T02TD1419E:317a-21: bdag nyid n'a da'i nang du thim //
T02TD1419E:317a-22: hi yig phan pa skye ba ste //
T02TD1419E:317a-23: rang gzhan don ni mnyam don can //
T02TD1419E:317a-24: ta yig dngos po thams cad rnams //
T02TD1419E:317a-26: sems can rjes su 'dzin pa legs //
T02TD1419E:317a-27: byis pa nyid ni spong ba ste //
T02TD1419E:317a-28: gru gzings 'grel pa gang ldan pa /
T02TD1419E:317b-0: @317b 'khor ba'i dba' rlabs las brgal lo //
T02TD1419E:317b-1: rgyal ba kun dang de'i sras dang //
T02TD1419E:317b-2: thams cad kyis ni bzod par rigs //
T02TD1419E:317b-3: rnal 'byor ma chogs dpal rnams dang //
T02TD1419E:317b-4: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs lha //
T02TD1419E:317b-5: rnam pa sna tshogs 'khor rnams dang //
T02TD1419E:317b-7: 'jig rten pa sngags lha rnams dang //
T02TD1419E:317b-10: rdzu 'phrul chen po'i klu kun dang //
T02TD1419E:317b-11: gang du bstan pa la dga' ba'i //
T02TD1419E:317b-12: srog chags gzugs can thams cad kyis //
T02TD1419E:317b-13: mtshan blangs pa yi skyon la ni //
T02TD1419E:317b-14: de dag kun gyis bzod par mdzod /
T02TD1419E:317b-15: rgyal ba rnams kyis lam gsungs pa'i //
T02TD1419E:317b-16: rgyud du 'ga' zhig ma shes par //
T02TD1419E:317b-18: bdag la so sor bzod pa mdzod //
T02TD1419E:317b-19: rnal 'byor ma sogs pa'i ye shes //
T02TD1419E:317b-21: bshad pa mkhyen pa yi ni 'khor //
T02TD1419E:317b-22: thams cad kyis ni bzod pa mdzod //
T02TD1419E:317b-23: 'jig rten pa sogs de rnams kun //
T02TD1419E:317b-24: rgol dang phyir rgol 'joms pa yi //
T02TD1419E:317b-25: grub pa'i dbang po chen po rnams //
T02TD1419E:317b-26: nga rgyal byed pa'i bdag nyid can //
T02TD1419E:317b-27: 'khor lo sngom pa'i mthar son pa'i //
T02TD1419E:317b-29: rnal 'byor ye shes gsal mi gsal //
T02TD1419E:317b-30: thams cad kyis ni bzod par mdzod //
T02TD1419E:317b-31: 'dus pa la sogs gzhan gyis ni //
T02TD1419E:317b-32: sbyor ba bsreg pa gang byas pa //
T02TD1419E:317b-33: de la'ang rnal 'byor dbang phyug kun //
T02TD1419E:317b-34: bdag la rtag tu bzod par mdzod //
T02TD1419E:317b-35: bla ma rdo rje 'dzin ston pa //
T02TD1419E:317b-37: gang du su dag spyod yul pa'am //
T02TD1419E:317b-38: mngon sum dang ni ring gnas pa //
T02TD1419E:317b-39: de rnams gnang ba blangs nas ni //
T02TD1419E:317b-40: myur du sems can don brtson la //
T02TD1419E:317b-41: des na bdag la bzod par mdzod //
T02TD1419E:317b-42: rdo rje'i grogs mched thams cad dang //
T02TD1419E:317b-43: mkhas ba'i skyes bu de bzhin du //
T02TD1419E:317b-44: bdag cag snyan dang gas mkhan rnams kyis //
T02TD1419E:317b-45: gzhung gi sdeb sbyor nyams sogs sam //
T02TD1419E:317b-46: don ma shes pa nyid rnams la ;
T02TD1419E:317b-47: / tshig rkang tsam zhig bcom pa ste //
T02TD1419E:317b-48: bdag la kun gyis bzod par mdzod //
T02TD1419E:317b-50: rnam par dpyad pas mngon legs na //
T02TD1419E:317b-51: gnyis su med ldan ston pa'i phyir //
T02TD1419E:317b-52: legs so pa yi dag 'dir byin //
T02TD1419E:317b-53: mkha' 'gro'i zho ni bsrubs ba las //
T02TD1419E:318a-2: de yi bsod rnams kyis 'jig rten //
T02TD1419E:318a-3: rdo rje 'dzin nyid thob par shog / ma dang pha sogs gnyen bshes dang //
T02TD1419E:318a-4: dge ba'i grogs po de bzhin du //
T02TD1419E:318a-5: byang chub kyi ni yul du bzhud //
T02TD1419E:318a-6: lhan cig skyes par rol cing mnos //
T02TD1419E:318a-7: sku gsum la sogs rgyu ru ni //
T02TD1419E:318a-8: thams cad kyi ni chos bstan gyis //
T02TD1419E:318a-9: sna tshogs skyes ba'i rab dang ni //
T02TD1419E:318a-10: sprul pa por ni 'gyur par shog //
T02TD1419E:318a-11: de la gnas nas rang gzhan don //
T02TD1419E:318a-12: mnyam pa med pas sal gyis //
T02TD1419E:318a-13: tshad med pa yi bde rnams su //
T02TD1419E:318a-14: de ni rab tu 'jug par mdzod //
T02TD1419E:318a-15: gang yang gzhan gyi sems can gyis //
T02TD1419E:318a-16: bdag gis yongs bshad 'di thos dang //
T02TD1419E:318a-17: reg dang gang gzhan thams cad kyis //
T02TD1419E:318a-18: mngon sum dang ni rjes su dpag / de rnams lus 'di nyid la ni //
T02TD1419E:318a-19: sangs rgyas nyid du rtag gyur cig / dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i 'grel pa gru gzings las rgyud gyi [*kyi] mtshan nyid bskyed pa dang yongs su bsdu ba la sogs pa'i cho ga'i rnam par gzhag pa bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyas par bstan pa'i bshad pa'o //
T02TD1419E:318a-20: ri bong gi rtags can gyi rigs la dga' pa padma rdo rje gnyis su med par 'byung ba'i ming can rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis bka' lung gis 'grel ba chen po 'di bkod pa'o //
T02TD1419E:318a-21: dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i 'grel ba gru gzings zhes bya ba grub pa'i slob dpon padma rdo rje'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1419E:318a-23: // / gzhung gi mtshan nyid nyams pa'i sdeb sbyor gyi tshigs su bcad pa stong phrag brgyad rnams so //
T02TD1419E:318a-25: dpal bal yul grub pa'i gnas chen po yam bu'i grong khyer gyi dbus yu tung lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang du rgya gar gyi bani ta rdo rje slob dpon chen po rtog ge pa'i gtsug gi nor bu dus ding sang 'gran zla med pa snying rje chen pos thugs brlan pa'i dang tshul can phyogs sna tshogs nas 'dus pa'i skye 'gro rnams la chos dang zang zing gi char gyis tshim par mdzad ba sh'akya'i sras po rgyal ba'i sde'i zhal snga nas dang /
T02TD1419E:318a-26: bod kyi lo ts'a ba sh'akya sang+ge'i dge slong chos kyi yon tan gyis bsgyur ba'o /
T02TD1419E:318a-28: // / yul dang zas spyod mi mthun pas //
T02TD1419E:318a-29: phung po rgyun du nad kyis gzung //
T02TD1419E:318a-30: 'on kyang dam chos la sred pas //
T02TD1419E:318a-31: 'bad pas bsgyur ro skyon mchis na //
T02TD1419E:318a-32: grub thob kun gyis bzod par mdzod //
T02TD1419E:318a-33: de las byung ba'i dge ba 'dis //
T02TD1419E:318a-34: 'jig rten kun gyi mun sel gyur //
